subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Todd Gurley and Keith Marshall, or Gurshall for short, have helped lead the offense for the title-hungry Bulldogs, but a win in the SEC title game on Saturday would prove their true mettle.
snippet: Todd Gurley and Keith Marshall, or Gurshall for short, have helped lead the offense for the title-hungry Bulldogs, but a win in the SEC title game on Saturday would prove their true mettle.
